scripts.build: rimraf build && parallelshell "npm run build:js" "npm run build:style"
scripts.build:style: node-sass --output-style compressed --source-map build/james.css.map style/main.scss build/james.css && autoprefixer build/james.css && npm run copy-files
scripts.copy-files: rimraf build/fonts && mkdirp build/fonts && ncp ./node_modules/font-awesome/fonts/ build/fonts/ && ncp ./resource/ ./build/
scripts.package: npm run build && rimraf ./package &&  mkdirp ./package && mkdirp ./binaries && browserify --node -e build/index.js -o ./package/index.js --exclude remote && npm run -s copy-files-package && npm run -s create-binaries
scripts.zip-binaries: cd binaries; rm *.zip; for i in *; do zip --symlinks -r "${i%/}.zip" "$i"; done
scripts.copy-files-package: rimraf package/fonts && mkdirp package/fonts && ncp ./node_modules/font-awesome/fonts/ package/fonts/ && ncp ./resource/ ./package/ && ncp ./build/james.css ./package/james.css
